name: Maths 24
description:
Solve for 24 or any other number, also available in the options menu. With 6 levels of difficulty high scores and timers M24, maths 24 is a fun filled brain and mind building game.

Does this app suit me?
-If you are interested in educational Games - This is one.
- If brain development or puzzle games is your thing then I'm sure you'll like it
- If you're practising for a Maths 24 tournament then it can only help.
- If you like a challenge, then try this one.

How To Play:
Simple really, Use the 4 numbers along with addition (+), Subtraction (-) Multiplication (*) and Division (/ ) in order to make 24. Normal B.O.D.M.A.S rules apply - but you can make heavy use of brackets. but be careful, you will lose points if you exceed your time limit.

Features:
Educational
Great Graphics
Excellent user Experience
exciting scoring system
Built in Algorithm to produce cards at various difficulties.
Simple and small design
